wikipedia_page.main: Professor William Thelwall Thomas MBE, ChM, FRCS (February 1865 – 10 September 1927) was a Welsh surgeon who worked in Liverpool.

response: Thomas's second child was Professor William Thelwall Thomas MBE, Ch.M., FRCS (1865–1927), president of the surgery section of the British Medical Association.

link_mentions.page: University of Liverpool School of Medicine
response: * William Thelwall Thomas, surgeon, president of Liverpool Medical Institution (1918)
